Detailed Description

It is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.


The file includes the definitons of functions which are associated with the configfile '~/.obrw.conf'.

Function Documentation

void obrwConfig_freeLocalsToClose ( void   ) 

Free memory of used locale variables with help of the free-methods in obrw_utils.c.

Returns:
Nothing, it's void.
const char* obrwConfig_getWallpaperDir ( void   ) 

The getter-method of the wallpaperdir, included in the configfile.

Returns:
The actually wallpaperpath (DIR which includes the wallpapers) as const char*.
Return values:
Wallpaperpath Canonical path of the seted wallpaperpath (Exp. /foo/bar/ ).
NULL Entry doesn't exist.
const char* obrwConfig_getWallpaperLastSet ( void   ) 

The getter-method of the last set wallpaper, included in the configfile.

Returns:
The last set wallpaper (lastWP-entry in configfile) as const char*.
Return values:
Last-Wallpaper Name of the last seted wallpaper (Exp. file.jpg ).
FIRST-SESSION First session that OBRW runs.
NULL Entry doesn't exist.
int obrwConfig_readConfigFile ( void   ) 

Read the configfile and parse included wallpaperpath and last set wallpaper.

Returns:
If the file (~/.obrw.conf) is read and writeable, includes correct entries for wpDir and lastWP, the method finishes with EXIT_SUCCESS, if any error occures EXIT_FAILURE returns.
Return values:
EXIT_SUCCESS success.
EXIT_FAILURE failed.
int obrwConfig_writeSettingsToConfigFile ( void   ) 

Write the now used settings into the configfile.

Returns:
If the file (~/.obrw.conf) is read and writeable (checked at ,obrwConfig_getWallpaperDir()) the method finishes with EXIT_SUCCESS, if any error occures EXIT_FAILURE returns.
Return values:
EXIT_SUCCESS success.
EXIT_FAILURE failed.
